pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.3: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.4: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.8: kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.3: Bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.1: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.2: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.3: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.6: bhedakānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.7: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.8: yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.1: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.2: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.3: Purisena—“itthannāmaṁ okāsaṁ āgacchā”ti vuttā gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.6: aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:5.1: Ussayavādikā bhikkhunī aḍḍaṁ karaṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.1: Ekā gāmantaraṁ gamanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.3: paṭhamaṁ pādaṁ parikkhepaṁ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:8.1: Samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:9.1: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.1: “Kiṁ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṁ anavassutā. Iṅgha, ayye, yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti, uyyojanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.2: Tassā vacanena khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.1: Kupitā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.1: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:13.1: Saṁsaṭṭhā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:14.1: “Saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha, mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.5: dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
